persionText: از این ستون به آن ستون فرجه
englishText: From this pillar to that one, there's relief.
germanText: Von dieser Säule zur nächsten gibt es Erleichterung.
meaning: Sometimes delaying or waiting can bring unexpected solutions or relief.

persionText: آب که از سر گذشت، چه یک وجب چه صد وجب
englishText: Once water passes over your head, whether one inch or a hundred, it doesn't matter.
germanText: Wenn das Wasser über den Kopf steigt, ist es egal, ob ein Zentimeter oder hundert.
meaning: When you're already in trouble, the extent of the problem doesn't really matter anymore.

persionText: گر صبر کنی ز غوره حلوا سازی
englishText: If you're patient, you can make halva from unripe grapes.
germanText: Mit Geduld kannst du aus unreifen Trauben Halva machen.
meaning: Patience and time can turn difficult situations into sweet outcomes.

englishText: The neighbor’s chicken is a goose.
germanText: Das Huhn des Nachbarn ist eine Gans.
meaning: What others have always seems better than what we have.

persionText: کار امروز را به فردا مینداز
englishText: Don't postpone today’s work to tomorrow.
germanText: Verschiebe die Arbeit von heute nicht auf morgen.
meaning: Don't procrastinate — do things on time.

persionText: تا نباشد چیزکی، مردم نگویند چیزها
englishText: There's always some truth behind gossip.
germanText: Ohne Grund reden die Leute nicht.
meaning: Unless there's something, people won’t say anything.
